nodes.text: The Attack of the Clones (French: L'Attaque des clones) is a junior novel adaptation of Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones. The Attack of the Clones was written by Catherine Kalengula and published by Hachette Jeunesse on June 7, 2017.
A long time ago, in a galaxy far, far away... . Many planets want to leave the Republic. A war is about to break out. But young Padmé is determined to protect the peace, with the help of the Jedi!
